title: Average ticket price Miami Heat ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2007/08 to 2009/10, gradually increasing from 2009/10 to 2013/14, and lastly roughly constant from 2013/14 to 2014/15.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010/11 and 2011/12.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 78.3 was reported at Year 2013/14, and 2014/15
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 58.55 was reached at Year 2007/08,  2008/09, and 2009/10
